summary: The document is a classified communication from 26 September 1970, detailing personnel assignments and technical operations in Libya. It highlights the use of UHF radio and SRAC systems for secure communication among operatives, alongside challenges with Libyan Customs over controversial materials. Plans for expanding communication networks and utilizing safehouses are also outlined.
key_findings: Details on personnel assignments and their roles within Libya.
Mention of technical operations including UHF radio system expansion and SRAC system usage.
Issues with Libyan Customs over the receipt of controversial materials.
Plans for secure communication methods among operatives, including the use of safehouses and modified devices.
